resources.string: "Too many dandelions covered your field. You managed to keep it clean for "
Do you really want to quit?

You are Mr. Joe Weeder, the proud owner of the most beautiful grass field in all of the district. Unfortunately, dandelions keep popping up out of nowhere. Your job: remove these pesky flowers before they cover your entire field. But you have to work quickly. If you don't get them before they start spreading their seeds, even more dandelions will appear. It is a lost race, but how long can you keep your field clean?

Game and visual art created by Softnez
Music from http://www.uniquetracks.com/Free-Music-Loops.html
